subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Aaron Rowand drove in the winning run with two outs in the 13th inning to salvage San Francisco’s home opener and keep the Giants  unbeaten with a  victory over the  Braves.
snippet: Aaron Rowand drove in the winning run with two outs in the 13th inning to salvage San Francisco’s home opener and keep the Giants  unbeaten with a  victory over the  Braves.
